casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gene Archer DICKENS, Jr. No. 15P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mitchell D. Norton, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of February 2005 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of March 2005."
